name: 4 Column YouMe
description: Experimental style to give 3 or 4 columns to YouMe.
additional_info:
This version works with both the Default and YouMe themes (Mustard and Black&White themes).

I have also added support to the MooPlus and test themes, but these are not officially supported by YouMe and could alter any time. The MooPlus theme is inherently split in two main columns, so this only really works with an even number of columns.

You can change it to 3 or 5 columns by tweaking the width percentage.
